DOCUMENT ()
  BEGIN_REGION (>>>DOCUMENT)
  COMMENT_BLOCK (####################)
  title (title:: Insert Conte)
    string (title:: Insert Conte)
  id (id:: td-000009)
    string (id:: td-000009)
  COMMENT_BLOCK (####################)
  PARAGRAPH (This SML document co)
    string (This SML document co)
  PARAGRAPH (SML allows you to in)
    string (SML allows you to in)
  PARAGRAPH (DEFINITION of ``Stru)
    string (DEFINITION of )
    dblquote_string (Structured Manuscrip)
      string (Structured Manuscrip)
  PARAGRAPH ((SML) A minimalistic)
    string ((SML) A minimalistic)
  PARAGRAPH (NARRATIVE of exercis)
    string (NARRATIVE of exercis)
  step (step:: Unplug your c)
    string (step:: Unplug your c)
  step (step:: Put it back i)
    string (step:: Put it back i)
  step (step:: Send it back.)
    string (step:: Send it back.)
  EXERCISE ()
    BEGIN_REGION (>>>EXERCISE)
    title (title:: Test Exercis)
      string (title:: Test Exercis)
    id (id:: exercise-1)
      string (id:: exercise-1)
    description (description:: This i)
      string (description:: This i)
    step (step:: Unplug your c)
      string (step:: Unplug your c)
    step (step:: Put it back i)
      string (step:: Put it back i)
    step (step:: Send it back.)
      string (step:: Send it back.)
    END_REGION (<<<EXERCISE)
  glossary (glossary:: Structure)
    string (glossary:: Structure)
  END_REGION (<<<DOCUMENT)
